NBA Finals Game 1

Thanks FlywheelNetworks for sending me to the NBA Finals game 1. I have never been to a finals game before, and this game was for the ages!

Look at what this game had:

  • Down 15 points in the 1st quarter
  • Basically tied by half time and close pretty much all game
  • Lebron James and he scored 40 something points
  • Game winner opportunity by Lebron but good thing he missed!
  • OVERTIME!!!
  • And of course the WIN!

NBA Finals!

Warming up. Curry's shot is so smooth.

Media Frenzy and of course TNT crew is here.

Ready to play. Tipoff!

Halftime with E40. Bay Arrrreeeeaaaaaaa.

Victory!!
